job.title: Data Scientist Software Engineer - Ag Robotics Start-up
job.description: <p><strong>We build robots for the next frontier of farming.&nbsp;</strong></p><p>We are a venture-backed startup based in Davis, CA, and we build robots to address some of farming’s toughest tasks.&nbsp; Here’s what we can offer to you that you can’t get anywhere else:&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>✅ The chance to transform an industry and improve the lives of millions of farmworkers.&nbsp;</p><p>✅ First-hand exposure to an endless supply of incredibly challenging technical problems.&nbsp;</p><p>✅ The pressure to invent cutting-edge solutions to said problems (and mess up along the way).&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><p>✅ Limitless career upside: you grow as we grow.&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><p>✅ The chance to live in the ‘burbs of sunny California and ride your bike to a farm for work everyday.&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><p>✅ A workplace that encourages building, learning and deploying.&nbsp; See <em>your work</em> in the field!&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>Still interested?&nbsp; Read our mission and the job description below to see if you’re a good fit for us!&nbsp; (www.advanced.farm)</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Use your powers for good!&nbsp;</strong></p><ul><li>Build the architecture for logging, events, and other information to support cutting edge data analysis</li><li>Analyze collected data to spot trends in performance and reliability to inform further development by engineering, R&amp;D, and field operations teams.&nbsp;</li><li>Write reproducible data analysis that can be automated and scaled as our equipment fleet grows.</li><li>Summarize and clearly communicate data analysis assumptions and results.&nbsp;&nbsp;</li><li>Build dashboards and applications that engineers, business managers and customers can rely on.&nbsp;</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Here’s what we’ll look for when we select someone to join the team.&nbsp;&nbsp;</strong></p><ul><li>M.S. or higher in mathematics, statistics, data science, engineering or a related field (no degree at all is also just fine, if you have a strong portfolio of examples)&nbsp;</li><li>3+ years experience working with data from hardware applications, and at least a basic knowledge of electrical and mechanical engineering concepts.&nbsp;</li><li>Strong skills in git, Python, SQL, matplotlib, numpy, pandas, other data science/visualization tools&nbsp;</li><li>Experience with web apps, devops, and machine learning.&nbsp;</li><li><strong><em>Legal work status in the US- please do not apply if you need visa sponsorship now or in the future.</em></strong></li></ul>
